Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.service

Class ForgeService<E,ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,ID>>

java.lang.Object
com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.service.ForgeService<E,ID,R>
Type Parameters:
E - the entity type
ID - the ID type
R - the repository type
Direct Known Subclasses:
HasNameForgeService
public abstract class ForgeService<E,ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,ID>> extends Object
Abstract base class for generated services. Provides standard business logic for CRUD operations.
